Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortsword; Simple
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Greatclub (+9 1d8+3); Mace (+9 1d6+3); Shortbow (+7 1d6+1 R80/320); Unarmed (+9 1+3)
Combat Notes:

Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Lightly Armored: Armor Proficiency (Light)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Assassinate: Adv on attack before foe's first turn/Successful surprise attack automatically crits
Cunning Action: May use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide 1/rd
Death Strike: Inflicts dbl damage on a successful surprise attack (DC 15 Constitution neg)
Durable: Regains a minimum of 4 HP from a Hit Die roll
Elusive: Attacks on self never have Adv
Fast Hands: May use Cunning Action to use Sleight Of Hand, disarm a trap, open a lock, or Use An Object
Sharpshooter: Suffers no Disadv on attacks at long range/Range attacks ignore 3/4 cover/May suffer -5 attack w/a ranged weapon to gain +10 damage
Sneak Attack: +10d6 damage on attacks w/Adv or shared threat
Stroke Of Luck: May change a miss into a hit or take an automatic 20 on an ability check 1/short rest
Thief's Reflexes: May take an extra turn during the first combat round at -10 Initiative
Uncanny Dodge: May use Reaction to reduce damage taken from an attack by half
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Intelligence; Wisdom

Save Notes:
Slippery Mind: Save Proficiency (Wisdom)
Evasion: Successful Dexterity save yields no damage instead of half; failure yields half damage
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 2; C1: 1; W0: 4; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 1 Attack: C: 6; Rogue: 10; W: 10 Spell DC: C: 14; Rogue: 18; W: 18
Spells:
Cure Wounds (C1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+0 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Find Familiar (W1 Conj): R10' Self gains service from a summoned spirit in animal form [R]
Fire Shield (W4 Evoc): Self gains resistance to heat or cold damage and a successful adjacent attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Fireball (W3 Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Fly (W3 Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed for conc up to 10 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Gentle Repose (W2 Necr): Touched corpse becomes immune to decay and animation for 10 dy [R]
Guidance (C0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc up to 1 min
Invisibility (W2 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Mage Hand (Rogue0 [Mage Hand Legerdemain] Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Magic Circle (W3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents choice of entry or exit (Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts Disadv on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by choice of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead for 1 hr [+Level extends duration +1 hr]
Protection From Evil And Good (W1 Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead; those creatures suffer Disadv on attacks on target
Ray Of Enfeeblement (W2 Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts half damage with Strength weapons (Constitution ends) for conc up to 1 min
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc up to 1 min
Sleep (W1 Ench): R90' 20' radius sleeps up to 5d8 HP of creatures, weakest first, for 1 min (damage or shaking wakens) [+Level affects +2d8 HP of creatures]
Tenser's Floating Disk (W1 Conj): R30' 3' x 1" force disk floats 3' high 20' behind self, holding 500 lbs for 1 hr [R]
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 C0 spells/May cast chosen C1 spell 1/long rest
Mage Hand Legerdemain: May stow and retrieve objects, pick locks, and disarm traps using an invisible Mage Hand
Magical Ambush: Foe suffers Disadv on save vs. self spell cast from hiding
Spell Thief: May negate foe spell on self and cast same w/in 8 hours (DC 18 neg) 1/long rest
Versatile Trickster: May use Mage Hand to distract foe w/in 5', gaining Adv on attacks
